easy_button.name: 7-Bead Abacus
easy_button.description: Use the easy button (or the normal button if the hard button is required), but receive 1.1x damage

choose_modifiers.name: Heart's Compass
choose_modifiers.description: Before foraging, you may choose what the next city's modifiers will be

apples_powerup.name: Red 40 Extract
apples_powerup.description: If using an Apple makes you exceed max HP, gain 10 max HP

ivory_dice_powerup.name: Overtime Contract
ivory_dice_powerup.description: If you use Ivory Dice when you could've tanked incoming damage (without items/SP), heal to max

chronographs_powerup.name: Crystallized Time
chronographs_powerup.description: When using a Chronograph, replay the level on ğŸ§Š speed (or normal speed if ğŸŒ¶ï¸ speed is required)

shields_powerup.name: Miracle Painkiller
shields_powerup.description: Shields block 3/4 of damage on Easy/Medium levels

skip_levels.name: Self-Running Shoes
skip_levels.description: Skip the first level of the first 3 cities you encounter

s_rank_bonus.name: Celebratory PiÃ±ata
s_rank_bonus.description: S ranking a level gives you 30 HP

use_winner.name: Backup Disk
use_winner.description: Twice per run, use the match winner's miss count instead of yours

immediate_foraging.name: Omni-Magnet
immediate_foraging.description: Foraging gives you items immediately, instead of after beating the level

cheaper_essence.name: Purifying Alembic
cheaper_essence.description: Essence costs are reduced and scale slower

double_foraging.name: Pocket Mirror
double_foraging.description: Levels played when foraging deal double damage, but yield double the items (not with Coffee)

old_foraging.name: Bottomless Coffee Cup
old_foraging.description: Foraging 2 items doesn't require playing a level, but prevents recovering

short_levels.name: Trusty Microscope
short_levels.description: Levels will be on the shorter side, but deal 1.2x damage

long_levels.name: Dusty Telescope
long_levels.description: Levels will be on the longer side, but deal 0.75x damage
